des: "This is an easy to make dry rub. It is especially good on pork and chicken. This mix creates a spicy/sweet citrus flavor for your next BBQ."
ins: Mix together the instant orange drink mix, cayenne pepper, paprika, garlic powder, allspice, and onion salt. Store at room temperature in an airtight container until used. Rub into chicken or pork and grill as desired.
